fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Grant a healing Powerful defense to another player.
- (Rehearse) Attack one person who visits you, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Negate an attack to your target, then attack the attacker.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- (Concert) If your target isn't attacked, do nothing.
- **Rehearse Radius:** 2
